revised_title: The Life and Contributions of Jack Cecil Drummond in Biochemistry and Nutrition
tldr: Jack Cecil Drummond was a prominent biochemist and nutritionist who made significant contributions to the understanding of vitamins and their role in human health. He worked on isolating and identifying various vitamins, and his research on the importance of a balanced diet led to advancements in cancer research and nutrition. Drummond's work laid the foundation for modern nutritional science and its applications in medicine and public health.
